description:
The notifications are quite out of sync with some of the instance object changes, in particular these very useful details are not included:
* progress
* cell_name
title: notifications should include progress info and cell name

comments.content: The notifications show updated task state, but don't show updated progress states, that would really help spot progress.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~johngarbutt
